channel.title: Hacking Question !?!?!
channel.description:
ok when u log in runescape and the first screen that comes up and looks like this [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/9646/hide3ha.png[/img] seee the blue part i covered thats my cousins ip addresse and i wanan know if i could hack his computer frm that..? i juss wanna try it out and see wat hes been doin on his computer... and will i be able to see him logging in on his runescape account because i wana hack his runescape account so i want to try to get his password for his account
thanks

item.title: Hacking Question !?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You can’t monitor someone’s outgoing network traffic just by knowing their IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Question !?!?!
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:2, topic:4058”]Yes and, wtf?

You can monitor his outbound packets, but it’d probably be encrypted. [/quote]
Pwnd, would you mind explaining to me how to monitor out going packets from somone else’s computer? If they are encrypted is it possible to decrypt them? I guess you can call me intermediate, yes i know what it means i just dont know how

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Question !?!?!
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:4058”]Everyone, Darkilla is what we call a “script kiddie.”

Darkilla, before you get into hacking, I suggest learning the English language.[/quote]

wuts englis?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Question !?!?!
item.dc:creator: @masterofjoe masterofjoe
item.description:
@masterofjoe wrote:

Search for Angry Blue’s Port Scanner, and scan his open ports. But if you think you’re going to open the command prompt, type in his open ports and magically hack him like in the movies, you’re sadly mistaken. Check www.milw0rm.com for some exploits. Personally, I hate the movie “Hackers” for making 11-13 year olds think they can “t0ta11y h4x0r t34 sch00l”.

Read full topic
